description:
This is a great metronome!
Getting it to work is an involved a process.
You need to install QSynth, and setup a soundfont in it (QSynth comes with a soundfont, you just need to open it in the Setup).
And finally, hook it all up with QjackCtl.
I'm using it in Ubuntu 18.04, along Guitarix.
Looks cool but sadly does not work, no sound :(
